attributes.action: explain increasing intrusion into PRIVATE lives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The smoking ban is the thin end of the wedge. How can it possibly apply to private clubs which by definition are not open to the public?
The same applies to pubs where landlords have ALWAYS had the choice of whether to allow smoking or not. Obviously there was no market for non-smoking pubs.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
